headline: Quanta Services (PWR) Raises 2025 Revenue and Earnings Guidance to US$27 Billion Plus
summary: Quanta Services (PWR) experienced a share price increase of 28% over the last quarter, which reflects a resilient performance amidst a generally strong market trend. The company's upward revision of earnings guidance for the year, with expected revenues of up to $27.9 billion, likely supported this price movement, signaling investor confidence. This, along with the $1.7 billion contract awarded to Quanta, likely gave investors reason to be optimistic about future growth prospects, enhancing...

headline: Quanta Tops Q2 Earnings & Revenue Estimates, Lifts 2025 View
summary: PWR beats Q2 estimates with 21% revenue growth, record backlog, and lifts 2025 outlook on strong energy project demand.

headline: AI Boom Keeps Feeding No. 2 Industry Group, As Argan Tops Buy Point
summary: Shares of Argan broke out past a buy point Thursday, while Quanta Services beat estimates and raised its outlook.  The moves helped feed the feed a four-month rally by the No. 2 heavy construction industry group.  Argan stock broke out of a base-on-base pattern and traded near the 246.60 buy point in morning trading.

headline: Quanta Services (PWR) Surpasses Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Quanta Services (PWR) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +2.06% and +3.34%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Quanta lifts annual forecast, buys Dynamic Systems in $1.35 billion deal
summary: Infrastructure solutions provider Quanta Services raised its annual results forecast on Thursday and said it has acquired peer Dynamic Systems in a deal valued at about $1.35 billion. The deal, which closed on July 25, was financed through $1.15 billion in cash and roughly $200 million in Quanta's common stock. "Dynamic Systems operates in growing end-markets, has a strong and visible opportunity pipeline and an accretive contribution to Quanta's growth, cash flow conversion, returns and earnings per share," Quanta CEO Duke Austin said.

headline: Quanta (NYSE:PWR) Beats Expectations in Strong Q2, Guides for Strong Full-Year Sales
summary: Infrastructure solutions provider Quanta (NYSE:PWR) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 21.1% year on year to $6.77 billion. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $27.65 billion at the midpoint came in 2.4% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.48 per share was 1.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Quanta Services: Q2 Earnings Snapshot

headline: Quanta Services Acquires Dynamic Systems A Premier, Turnkey Mechanical and Process Infrastructure Solutions Provider
summary: Quanta Services, Inc. (NYSE: PWR) announced today that it completed the acquisition of Dynamic Systems (DSI), LLC. (Dynamic Systems), a premier, turnkey mechanical, plumbing and process infrastructure solutions provider with a diversified customer base and exposure to the attractive and growing technology, semiconductor, healthcare and other load center markets. headline: QUANTA SERVICES REPORTS SECOND QUARTER 2025 RESULTS
summary: Quanta Services, Inc. (NYSE: PWR) today announced results for the three and six months ended June 30, 2025. Revenues in the second quarter of 2025 were $6.77 billion compared to revenues of $5.59 billion in the second quarter of 2024, and net income attributable to common stock was $229.3 million, or $1.52 per diluted share, in the second quarter of 2025 compared to net income attributable to common stock of $188.2 million, or $1.26 per diluted share, in the second quarter of 2024.
